name: clientdb.js
description: A Client-Side Database with Minimalistic Interface for IndexedDB (TypeScript supported)

scripts.test-browser: echo 'Test is running at http://127.0.0.1:8080/tests/' && http-server ./ -o
scripts.build-js: npm run build && browserify browser/export.js -p tinyify -o dist/ClientDB.js

author: Ambi Studio <https://ambi.studio>
